scripts.start:local: LOG_LEVEL=silly API_URL=http://localhost:4001 MANIFEST_PATH=/manifest PACKAGES_PATH= MAX_ARCHIVE_SIZE=50000000000 npm start
scripts.start:nonprod: LOG_LEVEL=silly API_URL=https://api.pennsieve.net MANIFEST_PATH=/download-manifest PACKAGES_PATH=/packages MAX_ARCHIVE_SIZE=50000000000 npm start
scripts.start:prod: LOG_LEVEL=silly API_URL=https://api.pennsieve.io/ MANIFEST_PATH=/download-manifest PACKAGES_PATH=/packages MAX_ARCHIVE_SIZE=50000000000 npm start

scripts.start:prod:jq: npm run start:prod | jq -R 'fromjson? | . | { message: .message, counts: .counts }'
